H0.text: In what year did Edward Vlll abdicate. 1930

H1.text: In what year did Edward Vlll abdicate. 1936 is excluded, so 1937

H2.text: In what year did Edward Vlll abdicate. 1920

H3.text: In what year did Edward Vlll abdicate. 1936

A4.text: The next day, the last act of his reign was the royal assent to His Majesty's Declaration of Abdication Act 1936.

A5.text: He was King of the United Kingdom and the British Dominions, and Emperor of India, from 20 January 1936 until his abdication in December of the same year.
